article_title: Zombies galore rule Great Adventure Fright Fest
article_text: An assemblyline of face painting and dressing happens each weekend night for Great Adventure's weekly Fright Fest where over 200 of the undead inhabit various areas of the park for fright seekers looking for a scrare. STAFF VIDEO BY PETER ACKERMAN
